frameRate.description: Animation playback rate in frames per second

startFrame.description: Starting frame number of the animation

endFrame.description: Ending frame number of the animation

loop.description: Whether the animation should loop continuously

rotation.description: Motor Rotation Property animation configuration range [0, 359] , 180 degree means robot facing-forward. the value is defined as absolute and mesured counter-clockwise

tilt.description: Motor Tilt Property animation configuration range [-30, 90], -ve value => tilt downward, +ve value => tilt upward. 0 => horizontal plane

animation.description: Whether this property should be animated

keyframe.description: Array of keyframes defining the animation

from_frame.description: Starting frame of this keyframe segment

to_frame.description: Ending frame of this keyframe segment

from_value.description: Starting value of this keyframe segment

to_value.description: Ending value of this keyframe segment

bezier.description: Bezier curve control points for interpolation, The array contains P1(OutTangent) and P2(Intangent) points of a cubic bezier curve where P1(0.0,0.0), P3(1.0, 1.0)
